poemsDataJson.list_full: あしびきの 山鳥(やまどり)の尾(を)の しだり尾(を)の ながながし夜(よ)を ひとりかも寝(ね)む
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Oh, the foot-drawn trail//Of the mountain-pheasant's tail//Drooped like down-curved branch!//Through this long, long-dragging night//Must I lie in bed alone?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ashibiki no|Yama-dori no o no|Shidario no|Naga-nagashi yo o|Hitori kamo nen
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: なかなかしよを ひとりかもねむ
poemsDataJson.author: 柿本人麻呂(かきのもとのひとまろ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 長い夜をひとり寝るさびしさの嘆き
